Summary: flashing blue light shot across horizon, stopped twice then dissapeared
divs: sighting detailswe were driving between portglenone & bellaghy in ireland on sunday 18\12\11. my wife was driving, i was in the passenger seat and two 12 year old children were in the back seat. my wife drew our attention to a flashing blue light directly ahead on the horizon approx 1 mile. at first we thought it was an abulance on the hill in the distance.it then shot across just above the horizon & stopped at a position of 9 o'clock in relation to the car. it had stopped flashing at this stage and stayed completely still for approx 2 seconds. it then shot across to a positon of 7 o'clock,stayed still for approx 1 second then dissapeared. my wife saw the object shooting off but did not see it stop as she was concentrating on driving. myself and the two children observed the rest of the movements. there was no noise and the visibility was very clear. the speed was incredible, if you blinked you would have missed it moving. the size of the object was difficult to guess as it never got closer to us than approx half a mile.
